TopicTitle: Last person to post is winner

Articles.Content: You all do realize that a moderator could just lock the thread and win whenever they want, right?
That\'s what happened to the original thread. It normally occurs at 1000 posts.
I do believe we\'re just over a 1/2th of this done.
I WIN - 8) you lose - :\'(
371 to go?
We need a new forum game instead of this.
hi lol

We need a new forum game instead of this.

I agree, this is sort of getting stale. It\'s just a spam-fest now.

I agree, this is sort of getting stale. It\'s just a spam-fest now.

Wasn\'t it always?

Also, is it possible to stop getting updates from a thread you posted in? I get updates for this like 40 times daily.

Wasn\'t it always?

Also, is it possible to stop getting updates from a thread you posted in? I get updates for this like 40 times daily.

Not as far as I know. Maybe if you deleted your posts, but if it\'s in something like the GCK, then they\'ll be needed.
I just won the game bro.
What if we play a game where we ban the other person for some stupid reason.
Nukes
Like I\'ve done before, I sum up my complaints/concerns/annoyances with an image:

Wasn\'t it always?

Also, is it possible to stop getting updates from a thread you posted in? I get updates for this like 40 times daily.

Go to your profile and select Notifications in the left sidebar.

Uncheck 'Turn notification on when you post or reply to a topic.'

Then click the UNOTIFY button at the top or bottom of this page. It\'s right there between ADD POLL and MARK UNREAD

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Go to your profile and select Notifications in the left sidebar.

Uncheck 'Turn notification on when you post or reply to a topic.'

Then click the UNOTIFY button at the top or bottom of this page. It\'s right there between ADD POLL and MARK UNREAD

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thanks, but I only meant for this thread.

Then use the button at the top or bottom of the thread that says 'UNNOTIFY'.

The checkbox in your profile turns off the automatically subscribing feature and would only affect new threads you post in. It would not remove any existing subscriptions you may have.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
